titles.title: Made in America Manufacturing Communities Act of 2022
Made in America Manufacturing Communities Act of 2022
To authorize the Secretary of Commerce to establish the Manufacturing Communities Support Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Made in America Manufacturing Communities Act of 2022
This bill establishes the Manufacturing Communities Support Program to provide financial and technical assistance to support investments in U.S. manufacturing.
